channel.title: Wtf sprites
channel.description: There's a mod on my server and whenever he PM's me he hsa a donor sign next to his name... help?

item.title: Wtf sprites
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Project Fantastico, post:10, topic:511514”]Its both sided

You need the source to go online and do stuff.
You need the client, not really if you use a webclient or etc.
you need the cache, to play.

This is more of a client issue should be around client.java or others like i said i have no idea what you are using.[/quote]
No. The source controls EVERYTHING.
The client just shows you what the source is doing,
the cache is part of the client.
Think of this like an online game, such as BF3 or Black Ops 2. The servers for online, control the gameplay and everything. The servers, do nothing but that. They are consoles (Not like our shit little CMD consoles). The client(s) are the game discs, and the people playing. I.E. You. The cache, would be the maps you play on, the guns, and the character models. The Cache needs the client, the client needs the server. The server doesn’t need the either. As it runs fine without them. We need the client/cache.
Wow, now you’re using my words, and calling them your own. that’s smart.

Free Sosa:

SO then what the love do I do?

You need to change the ints in the client so it has both male and female wear ID’s

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf sprites
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:511514”][quote author=Project Fantastico link=topic=629759.msg4271458#msg4271458 date=1364569263]
This has to do with the chat.java or others i forget.
[/quote]
shut up. No offence, if you don’t know what you’re doing… Don’t comment.
This is a client sided issue (assuming this is 317).
It’s calling the wrong sprite for the pm method.
What type of client are you using here?[/quote]

Bit harsh, he was only trying to help.

@OP, you were given the answer.

Read full topic

This is server sided idiot depending what he is using [ pi, delta, hyperion, shards, matrx etc.]

You didn’t even read my post, you saw “shut up” and raged.
Anything 317 (unless you made it load cache server sided) will have this in the client.
So shut your mouth.
